Title: The Starzl Mutation
Plot: Tom and Diana's investigation into a series of gruesome murders leads them to uncover another conspiracy within the government. At the 4400 Center, Shawn receives a gift from another returnee that allows him to see his future.
GuestStars: Chilton Crane,  Yee Jee Tso,  Philip Lyall,  Brian George,  Yurij Kis,  Malcolm Scott,  Gardiner Miller,  Daniel Arnold,  Darcy Cadman,  Donna Yamamoto,  Randal Edwards,  Jamie Martz,  J. August Richards,  Kaj-Er
